name: Reality Check (Radlas, Amberkazefan69)
description:
A horde of pawns are making their way towards you, they are just harmless civilians, but not everything is as they seem, evil is hidden amongst them, and it is up to you to seek them out with your phone radar and destroy them! Controls:

WASD - Move
LMB / Arrow Keys - Attack
RMB / SPACE - Use telephone (to identify enemies)
SHIFT - Dash
ESC - Pauses the game and brings up settings

Points:

Pawns will appear from the top and march towards the bottom of the board, good pawns will reward you with points while evil pawns with penalize you. Hurting a civilian pawn will also penalize you. Your score cannot drop below zero, you will lose one health if any actions makes your points go below zero. So make sure you don't hit the good pawns and don't let the evil pawns reach the end!

Scanning:

The phone is used to scan for the hidden enemies (Using RMB or SpaceBar).
The ability will be placed on cool down and a radar will shoot out from the character, revealing the hidden enemies.

Reality cracks will also start to form on the board as time goes on, revealing enemies as long as they are over them.

Third party assets:
